Class ViewResult

java.lang.Object
task02.ViewResult
All Implemented Interfaces:
View
Direct Known Subclasses:
ViewTable
public class ViewResult extends Object implements View
The ViewResult class implements the View interface and provides functionality for initializing, calculating, saving, restoring, and displaying numerical conversion results.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ViewResult()
    Constructs a ViewResult object with the default number of elements.
    ViewResult(int n)
    Constructs a ViewResult object with a specified number of elements.

    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<CalculationData>
    getItems()
    Returns the list of calculation data objects.
    void
    setItems(ArrayList<CalculationData> items)
    Sets the list of CalculationData items.
    void
    show()
    Displays the numerical representations of all stored calculation data objects.
    void
    viewCalculate()
    Performs numerical conversions on all stored calculation data objects.
    void
    viewInit()
    Initializes the view by generating new random calculation data objects.
    void
    viewRestore()
    Restores the list of calculation data objects from a serialized file.
    void
    viewSave()
    Saves the current list of calculation data objects to a file via serialization.

      Restores the list of calculation data objects from a serialized file.
      Specified by:
      viewRestore in interface View
      Throws:
      Exception - if an I/O error occurs or the class of the serialized object cannot be found

    • setItems

      public void setItems(ArrayList<CalculationData> items)
      Sets the list of CalculationData items. This method converts the provided list of CalculationData objects into an ArrayList and assigns it to the internal list of items.
      Specified by:
      setItems in interface View
      Parameters:
      items - a list of CalculationData objects to be set
